attributes.action: REDUCE THE COST OF HOLIDAYS DURING SCHOOL HOLIDAYS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: JUST PRICED A HOLIDAY FOR AUGUST AND IT IS A £1,000.00 MORE THAN GOING DURING SCHOOL TIME, THOSE WITH CHILDREN CANNOT AFFORD THIS, DUE TO THEIR EVERYDAY LIVING COSTS, BUT IT IS IMPORTANT THAT THEY HAVE QUALITY TIME WITH THEIR PARENTS.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
